backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a video sharing platform with blob storage, access control, video upload/retrieval, user profiles, and a follower system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—the 'About Florida Dave' bio section and the wave SVG divider—to their source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for build planning and code navigation.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for feed, video player, profile, and upload pages, and conditionally renders the profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Renders the 'About Florida Dave' section with a heading, bio paragraph, and WaveDivider components above and below the content.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps page content with a sticky navigation bar, centered main container, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and disabled state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Sticky top navigation bar with app logo, links to Videos and Profile pages, a conditional Upload Video button for authenticated users, and the LoginButton.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a display name to create their profile, with form validation and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/UploadSuccessMod: Confirmation modal displayed after a successful video upload, with a button to navigate back to the video feed.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A card component that displays a video's thumbnail, title, description, view count, and upload date, and navigates to the video page on click.
frontend/src/components/WaveDivider.tsx: A purely decorative SVG wave divider component rendered as a full-width horizontal separator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including listing/fetching videos, user profiles, video uploads, thumbnail uploads, admin checks, and follow/unfollow operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: A profile page that displays the creator's stats (videos, views, followers), persists the creator's principal in localStorage, and allows authenticated non-creator users to follow or unfollow the creator.
frontend/src/pages/UploadVideoPage.tsx: Page component for uploading videos with title, description, thumbnail, and video file inputs; enforces 10–20 second duration limits, tracks upload progress, and shows a success modal on completion.
frontend/src/pages/VideoFeedPage.tsx: Page that fetches and displays a grid of video cards with loading skeletons, an empty state, and an AboutSection component below the feed.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Page that loads and plays a single video by ID, displaying its title, upload date, view count, description, and an optional thumbnail poster.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography/container-queries/animate plugins, and extended font families, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Florida Dave platform, its existing features (About section, wave divider), pending feature requests (video feed with likes/views), and known display issues.
